string-array.name: item_contents_array
string-array.item: Commercial ply decorative wall paneling at main door entrance.
Semi marine decorative safety door without grill.
Commercial ply Decorative unit at kitchen partition wall.
MDF CNC Design placing at kitchen partition including DUCO PAINT.
Royal painting at living room to passage and kitchen celling.
Commercial ply crockery unit fixing above service platform.
Marine ply shutter fixing with wooden frame for kitchen platform and service platform.
Gypsum celling at kitchen for pipe.
Commercial ply wardrobe with openable doors at bed side.
Commercial ply Side wall unit fixing with openable door above wardrobe at loft level.
Commercial ply box type bed with cupsar.
Decorative gypsum celling.
Royal painting at living room to passage and kitchen celling.
Commercial ply wardrobe with openable doors
Commercial ply Side wall unit fixing with open able door above wardrobe at loft level.
EXTRA ELECTRICAL POINTS (APPROX).

string-array.name: Notes_array
string-array.item: Plumbing fixtures / Hardware (door latch, handles, fittings etc.)/Electrical fixtures (lamps/ fan, regulators ext.) Provided by client.
Electrical main line shifting/ changing, M.C.B. Fixing charges extra.
Lamination basic rate 1200/00 per sheet.
We will require 7 days to start the work after issue of work order.
